title: How will Ethereum price react to Bitcoin ETF approval? - Cointelegraph
summary:
The article discusses the potential impact of a Bitcoin ETF approval on the price of Ethereum (ETH). The SEC is set to make a decision on a Bitcoin ETF on January 10, and if approved, it could pave the way for other crypto-based ETFs, including Ethereum. The article highlights that Ethereum is not named as a security in any of the SEC's recent lawsuits targeting crypto exchanges, and the commission has also not challenged Ethereum's classification through the ETF registration process with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC).

The article also notes that Ethereum's price has been correlated with Bitcoin's price in recent years, which could suggest that a Bitcoin ETF approval may trigger a surge in crypto exposure among traditional investors and lead to an increase in ETH price. However, the article also mentions that a delay or denial of the Bitcoin ETF approval could result in short-term bearish pressure as the market adjusts to the setback.

title: Justin Sun and Another Whale Accumulate Over $180,000,000 Worth of Ethereum in Less Than Two Weeks: Lookonchain - The Daily Hodl
summary: Justin Sun and an unknown crypto whale have accumulated over $180 million worth of Ethereum (ETH) in the last two weeks, according to on-chain data from Lookonchain. Sun withdrew $25.3 million worth of ETH from Binance and another $39.2 million from Binance since December 26th. Meanwhile, crypto-focused venture capital firm Paradigm has deposited 6,500 ETH into Coinbase, potentially for sale on the open market. The current price of ETH is $2,248.

title: Bankrupt Lender Celsius Waiting to Unstake Nearly $470,000,000 Worth of Ethereum (ETH): Nansen - The Daily Hodl
summary: Celsius, a bankrupt crypto lending platform, is set to unstake nearly $470 million worth of Ethereum (ETH) as part of its liquidation process. The company has begun the unstaking process for its ETH holdings, which have provided valuable staking rewards income to the estate, to offset certain costs incurred throughout the restructuring process. According to on-chain data, Celsius is currently waiting to unstake 206,319 ETH. A new plan approved by a judge aims to generate funds for a new mining and staking corporate spinoff designed to repay creditors, which will have a $1.25 billion balance sheet and $450 million of which will be liquid crypto.

title: Ethereum Giga Whales On A Historic Buying Spree – Here’s How Much ETH They’ve Bought - NewsBTC
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum whales have been buying the cryptocurrency in large quantities, with a record 65.71 million ETH (54.67% of total circulating supply) held by top addresses. The top 150 self-custodial wallets hold 56.25 million ETH, nearing a five-year low. This accumulation is a positive sign for the long-term price, as it indicates whales believe the price will continue to increase. A recent purchase by an Ethereum whale, identified as '0x931', added 21,192 ETH to their holdings, with a total of 79,500 ETH bought since January 2023. Liquid staking protocols have also seen steady deposits throughout 2023, with 12.3m ETH ($27.585 billion) currently locked in ETH liquid staking derivatives, representing an 80% growth from January 2023.

title: Ethereum Price Prediction : ETH Price Poised To Surge 340% in 2024 - Coinpedia Fintech News
summary:

title: Ethereum: Sell-off prediction looms as price falls 1.5% in 7 days - AMBCrypto News
summary: Ethereum (ETH) price fell by 1.5% in the last seven days, with a current price of $2,243.76. Whale activity has been observed, with Paradigm depositing 6,500 ETH on Coinbase, worth over $14.6 million. This has raised concerns of a larger sell-off. However, buying pressure on ETH has increased, with a spike in its Whale Transaction Count and Supply held by top addresses. Supply on Exchanges dropped, while Supply outside of Exchanges increased. Net deposit on exchanges was also low, indicating high buying pressure. Despite this, ETH's network activity has declined, and it has been surpassed by BNB Chain in terms of user activity. Derivatives market metrics have turned bullish, with Open Interest and BitMEX Funding Rate dropping. If a bull rally occurs, ETH will face resistance near $2,300 and $2,400, with a sharp increase in liquidation spike last time it reached those levels.

title: Ethereum behind, BNB Chain ahead – The case of user activity - AMBCrypto News
summary: BNB Chain has surpassed Ethereum in terms of user activity, with 4.18 million unique active wallets completing transactions in the last month, up 29%, while Ethereum saw a 13% drop in user activity to 1.28 million active addresses. BNB Chain's transaction count also increased by 22 million, while Ethereum's transaction count declined by 44% to 3.34 million. BNB Chain's fees and revenue grew by 50% to $18.35 million, while Ethereum's fees and revenue climbed by 10%. BNB's price rallied 31% in the last month and its RSI and MFI remain above their center lines, suggesting buying activity exceeds distribution.

title: What Is NEO and How Is It Used? - Investopedia
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

NEO is a blockchain platform that aims to create a smart economy by digitizing assets and identities through smart contracts. It has two native tokens, NEO and NEO Gas, which are used for different purposes. NEO is used to establish ownership and management roles, while NEO Gas is used to pay for transactions on the blockchain. The platform uses a consensus mechanism called Delegated Byzantine Fault Tolerance (dBFT) to achieve a majority agreement of more than two-thirds. NEO is different from other standard blockchain platforms in its focus on regulatory compliance and development of decentralized applications. The article also compares NEO to Bitcoin and Ethereum, highlighting its unique features and capabilities.

title: ETH Uncertain Above $2.2K but is a Drop Toward $2,000 in Play? (Ethereum Price Analysis) - CryptoPotato
summary: Ethereum (ETH) is experiencing uncertainty above $2,200, with a potential drop to $2,000 in play. The cryptocurrency has been consolidating between $2,100 and $2,400 over the past month, with the Relative Strength Index (RSI) hovering around 50%, indicating an equilibrium in momentum. The open interest metric has been rising, indicating a bullish market sentiment, but a recent decline in open interest may suggest that many long positions have been flushed out. The direction of the upcoming trend remains uncertain until the funding rate metric experiences a notable move.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Whales Driving Buyup, Here's Price Reaction - CoinGape
summary: Ethereum (ETH) whales are driving a buy-up, with over 410,000 units accumulated in the past month, valued at $920 million. This accumulation has the potential to shift the price of ETH by a fraction of a percentage. The coin's price has been erratic, with a high of $2,400 on December 9, followed by a bearish correction. However, the revived interest from whales could change the narrative moving forward. Other on-chain metrics, such as daily active addresses and whale transactions, are also showing positive trends. Additionally, Ethereum is expected to receive fundamentals such as a spot ETF product and focus on developing Ethereum Name Service (ENS) for Layer-2 scaling solutions.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Is Getting Ready For ETF Approval, Solana (SOL) and Ethereum (ETH) Stabilize as Pushd (PUSHD) Starts New Presale Stage - U.Today
summary: Bitcoin (BTC) and other cryptocurrencies are experiencing a period of price adjustment as investors take profits ahead of potential ETF approval. Solana (SOL) and Ethereum (ETH) have seen stability, with Solana up 1,100% and Ethereum up 80% in the past year. Pushd (PUSHD) has entered a new stage of its presale, offering revenue sharing to investors. The Pushd marketplace aims to provide a decentralized alternative to Web2 ecommerce platforms with low fees and minimal listing charges. The potential approval of a Bitcoin ETF has driven Bitcoin prices up 160% in the past year.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Drop As ETF Decision Deadline Nears: Analyst Predicts 'Nice 10x' For Apex Cry - Benzinga
summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dogecoin prices dropped on Sunday evening as the deadline for the approval of the first US Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) approaches. Analysts predict significant impact on the crypto market, with some predicting a 10x price surge for Bitcoin. The global crypto market cap has reached $1.66 trillion, with a 4.80% decrease in the last 24 hours. U.S. stock futures were relatively unchanged, with investors awaiting inflation data and big bank earnings in the week ahead.

title: Polygon NFT sales volume has surpassed that of Solana - CoinGape
summary: Polygon NFT sales volume has surpassed Solana's in the past 24 hours, with Polygon ranking third after Bitcoin and Ethereum according to CryptoSlam data. Polygon recorded a daily sales volume of $9.986 million, while Solana's was $4.116 million, representing a 43% increase for Polygon and a 17% decrease for Solana. Polygon also has a higher wash sales figure than Solana. The total number of traders who helped Polygon achieve this feat was 12,283, with a higher trader count than on Bitcoin and Ethereum. The growth of Inscriptions on Polygon may be contributing to this massive NFT sales volume. This milestone is part of a broader trend of layer-2 solutions maturing, as seen in the increased competition among participants in the crypto industry.

title: How To Bridge And Trade On The Injective (INJ) Network - TradingView
summary: Injective is a blockchain designed for finance, with advanced DeFi applications like spot and derivative exchanges, and lending protocols. It aims to solve the scalability challenge in the crypto space, with transaction speeds of up to 0.8 seconds and gas fees as low as $0.01. Injective Network is compatible with EVM-based wallets like Metamask and Cosmos-based wallets like Keplr, and users can acquire INJ tokens through centralized exchanges like Binance or by bridging tokens from other chains. The network also features a decentralized exchange (DEX) called Astroport, where users can trade INJ and other tokens. Additionally, Coinhall is a multi-token bridge swap DEX that allows users to bridge and swap tokens directly.

title: Ethereum's liquid staking protocols experience remarkable growth, surpassing $27 billion in value - Cryptopolitan
summary: Ethereum's liquid staking protocols have experienced remarkable growth, with a 27% increase in value to $27 billion. Ethereum-based liquid staking protocols have locked in 12.31 million ETH, up from 10.16 million in July 2023. Lido Finance is the leading player in this domain, with 1.7 million ETH held since July 2023. Other key players include Binance, Coinbase, and new entrants like Mantle and Swell. The growth in Ethereum's liquid staking protocols signifies a strong and growing interest in Ethereum-based staking mechanisms, which are a crucial aspect of the network's security and functionality.

title: Ethereum whales acquire over 410,000 $ETH valued at nearly $1 billion in the past month - Cryptopolitan
summary: Ethereum whales have acquired over 410,000 ETH (nearly $1 billion) in the past month, sparking interest and speculation within the crypto community. This significant influx of capital has led to increased demand and rising prices, but has also raised questions about market manipulation and the influence of whales on the market. Some view these large purchases as a positive sign of confidence in Ethereum's future, while others are cautious about the need for transparency and equitable market practices. The recent activity of Ethereum whales has led to divided opinions within the cryptocurrency community and has caught the attention of regulators worldwide.

title: New ICO Token's +950000% ROI Potential Makes BONK, ETH, & Shiba Inu Traders Invest Fast & Big - Blockchain Reporter
summary: Mollars, a new cryptocurrency, is gaining attention for its potential to offer a +950,000% ROI long-term. The token is designed to solve the issue of high fees for Bitcoin cross-chain swaps on the Ethereum blockchain, and it has already attracted significant investment from major cryptocurrency holders. With a total supply of 10 million tokens, the token's CEX liquidity pool will receive half of the funds raised in the initial coin offering, while the remaining funds will go towards developing a web3 product, marketing, and building brand value. The token is currently available for purchase via a private exchange, with a discounted rate of $0.30, and it is expected to list on public exchanges by May 2024.
